response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This product is not just an item; it's an experience tailored to elevate your lifestyle. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase it for $12,000.
